data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Gent get the game underway.
Franck Kanoute scores to make it 1-0 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 14, Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Gent) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Cercle Brugge have been given a penalty at Jan Breydel Stadium...
Goal! Cercle Brugge take a 2-1 lead thanks to a Dino Hotic spot-kick..
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Nathan Verboomen blows to start the second-half. Cercle Brugge with the kick-off.
Cercle Brugge take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Ike Ugbo.
In the minute 58, Wim De Decker is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Niklas Dorsch replacing Sulayman Marreh.
The home team replace Dino Hotic with Leonardo da Silva Lopes.
Wim De Decker (Gent) is making a second substitution, with Roman Bezus replacing Anderson Niangbo.
In the minute 63, An attacking Gent player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Gent are back in the match in Bruges. A Roman Yaremchuk penalty has made the score 3-2.
Alexander Corryn is replacing Vitinho for the home team.
In the minute 76, The home team have replaced Anthony Musaba with Charles Vanhoutte. This is the third substitution made today by Paul Clement.
Goal! Ike Ugbo extends Cercle Brugge's lead to 4-2.
Goal! Jean Harrison Marcelin extends Cercle Brugge lead to 5-2 with a header.
That's full-time at Jan Breydel Stadium. The final score is 5-2.
